channel.title: 3.12 bug
channel.description:
When I compile or run a script it opens a new tab in scar it says SCAR resource library. I am not doing anything it just opens up and when I close it and compile or run it does the same thing.Help please.
EDIT:Pictures are here:[center][img]http://i236.photobucket.com/albums/ff205/script_owned/bugimage.jpg?t=1190676778[/img][/center]AND HERE: [center][img]http://i236.photobucket.com/albums/ff205/script_owned/bugimage2.jpg?t=1190677089[/img][/center]

@script_owned4 wrote:

I thought it was a SCAR bug…k,I will try and do that again.I will edit my post if I get the same thing.

item.title: 3.12 bug
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

What ur seeing is the ability of scar to show where bugs are at so you can easilly fix them, and this isn’t a bug in SCAR but a bug in SRL, press “Download SRL” in the file menu again.
And finally, if you have any bugs to report do it in the scar bugs section of my forum (http://forums.freddy1990.com) or there’s a good chance I won’t notice it.

Read full topic
